mapper.select: SELECT v.visit_id, v.member_id, f.user_id, -- ‚úÖ user_idÎäî family_memberÏóêÏÑú Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò¥ v.hospital_name, v.department, v.visit_date, v.cost, v.diagnosis, f.name AS member_name, f.relation AS member_relation FROM visit v JOIN family_member f ON v.member_id = f.member_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY v.visit_date DESC

SELECT v.visit_id, v.member_id, f.user_id, v.hospital_name, v.department, v.visit_date, v.cost, v.diagnosis, f.name AS member_name, f.relation AS member_relation FROM visit v JOIN family_member f ON v.member_id = f.member_id WHERE v.visit_id = #{visit_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE visit SET hospital_name = #{hospitalName}, department = #{department}, visit_date = #{visitDate}, cost = #{cost}, diagnosis = #{diagnosis} WHERE visit_id = #{visitId}
